nodes.text: Leia Organa: Ordeal of the Princess

Leia Organa: Ordeal of the Princess is a Japanese webcomic by Line Corporation. An adaptation of Claudia Gray's young adult novel Leia, Princess of Alderaan, it is illustrated by Haruichi. The first part of the comic was uploaded on LINE's official blog on May 4, 2019. The manga was on hiatus between December 2019 and May 2021 due to the author's health issues.
